## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G19380](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G19380)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PUB25</u>
- **Gene Name:** plant U-box 25
- **Description:**   plant U-box 25;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090604
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [pub25-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Smaller lesions when inoculated with B.cinerea, and reduced bacterial population when inoculated with Pto DC3000.
